resources.string: The app notification icon is not open! Should I open it?

Hi， Fill in your personal information

Personal information is only used for local personalized calculation of health indicators such as calorie consumption and exercise heart rate range analysis. We respect your privacy and data security, so there is no need to worry about information leakage
Connect the ring to the charging case, activate the ring and approach the phone to ensure Bluetooth is turned on
You can investigate the cause and search again in the following way

1. The device is not nearby, please bring it closer to your phone 2. The device has run out of battery. Please connect the device to a charger and make sure it has power before searching 3. The phone does not have Bluetooth enabled. Please turn on Bluetooth and search again 4. The device is already connected to the Bluetooth system of the mobile phone. Please ignore the device and search again
Ensure that Bluetooth is enabled on the phone and that the current device is not connected to another phone
The phone does not support Bluetooth
Bluetooth not turned on, please turn on your phone\'s Bluetooth function
The device does not support this function
Please turn on location service first
Are you sure you want to the current device
Please grant the necessary permissions so that the APP can provide you with better services
No equipment available at the moment
Bluetooth permission is not enabled and cannot connect to your ring device. Please allow the app to access your Bluetooth permission.
We still need %s steps to meet the standard, which is approximately equivalent to walking %s
If you have met the standards, it shows great. You have achieved today\'s goal

You have good emotional regulation and social adaptability. Continue to maintain healthy lifestyle habits and a positive mindset, conduct regular self-assessment, and pay timely attention to your psychological state
You may be experiencing some mild mental health issues, such as emotional fluctuations, mild anxiety, or depression. Suggest timely relaxation of mood and adjustment of psychological state

You may have symptoms such as excessive stress and anxiety, and serious psychological problems can affect your physical health. You can seek professional help to improve your psychological problems in a timely manner

Yesterday\'s performance was extremely poor, and you may be in a state of high pressure and high fatigue. It is recommended to immediately adjust your daily routine, increase rest and exercise. If it persists poorly, it is recommended to seek help from a health expert.
Yesterday\'s poor physical and mental state may be due to work pressure or lifestyle habits. Please arrange your work and rest time reasonably, and try relaxation methods such as meditation or yoga.

If your performance is average, you may need to pay more attention to your physical and mental health. It is recommended to maintain good daily habits, increase outdoor activities and social interaction.
Good performance, continue to maintain this healthy state! Maintain regular daily routines and dietary habits, and also try incorporating some mental health exercises.
Your performance is amazing. Continue to maintain a healthy lifestyle, enhance your stress resistance and ability to cope with challenges, and make you more calm and confident in life and work.
Set your exercise and sleep goals
Customized sharing of indicator report content
The lowest blood oxygen level throughout the night is %d, suspected of respiratory distress
The lowest blood oxygen level throughout the night is %d, and sleep breathing is stable
Deep sleep needs to be strengthened
Quiet heart rate too high, poor recovery at night
Resting heart rate is normal and very healthy

Yesterday\'s performance was extremely poor, and you may have been under high pressure and high fatigue. It is recommended to immediately adjust your daily routine, increase rest and exercise. If it persists poorly, it is recommended to seek help from a health expert.
Yesterday\'s poor physical and mental state may be due to work pressure or lifestyle habits. Please arrange your work and rest time reasonably, and try relaxation methods such as meditation or yoga.
Performance is average, and you may need to pay more attention to your physical and mental health. It is recommended to maintain good daily habits, increase outdoor activities and social interaction.
Performed well, continue to maintain this healthy state! Maintain regular daily routines and dietary habits, and also try incorporating some mental health exercises.
Excellent performance, continue to maintain a healthy lifestyle, enhance your stress resistance and ability to cope with challenges, making you more calm and confident in life and work.

Blood oxygen, also known as blood oxygen saturation, refers to the percentage of hemoglobin in the blood that combines with oxygen to total hemoglobin. It reflects the amount and supply of oxygen in the human blood. Under normal circumstances, the value of blood oxygen saturation should be between 95% and 100%, and the blood oxygen level within this range can ensure that all organs and tissues of the body receive sufficient oxygen supply.
How to measure blood oxygen saturation

1. Wear the ring on the middle or ring finger, align the sensor side with the fingertip position, activate the blood oxygen measurement on the app, and wait for a few seconds to obtain the blood oxygen value. 2. Certain external factors (tattoos, hair, shaking, wearing deviation, low temperature, etc.) may affect measurement accuracy and may even result in inability to output results. 3. This product is not a medical device, and the data and recommendations provided are for reference only and cannot be used as a basis for clinical diagnosis and treatment.
Testing in progress, please wear it correctly and keep it stationary
Measurement failed, please confirm that the device is correctly worn

1. Please wear the smart ring circuit board side (inner circle with letter pattern side) close to your fingertips (palm side). \2. Ensure that the fingertips on which the ring is worn have no tattoos, stains, etc.
During heart rate monitoring, please keep wearing the device and wait for the measurement to complete.
Your sleep and breathing are good, please continue to maintain
You may have mild obstructive sleep apnea
You may have moderate obstructive sleep apnea
You may have severe obstructive sleep apnea
There is currently no data available. Please wear a watch and turn on sleep oxygen monitoring
There is currently no data available, go wear a smart ring and learn about your sleep status
No nap available at the moment
The World Health Organization recommends that adults engage in an average of 30 minutes of moderate to high-intensity exercise per day. Your exercise intensity is too low and not yet up to standard!
The World Health Organization recommends that adults engage in an average of 30 minutes of moderate to high-intensity exercise per day, and your exercise intensity has reached the standard！

Record whether you have standing behavior every hour. If you have standing and activity behavior for more than one minute within one hour, it will be recorded as standing for one hour. Long term sitting will increase the risk of cardiovascular, cerebrovascular, obesity, depression, diabetes, gastrointestinal diseases, etc. It is recommended to get up and exercise for at least one minute every hour to avoid long term sitting.
The overall stress state is relatively relaxed, maintain the status quo, continue to enjoy the current state, timely participation in activities, and enrich life.

You may face mild stress, pay attention to timely adjustment of mentality, keep positive, maintain physical and mental balance, while accepting small challenges, and constantly exercise their ability to adjust stress.

You may be experiencing high levels of stress at the moment, so it is recommended that you delve into the sources of stress and develop effective coping strategies. While maintaining a positive attitude, we should pay more attention to physical and mental rest and recovery, such as regular exercise and adequate sleep. When necessary, seek the support and help of friends, family or professionals to face challenges together.

You may feel physically and mentally exhausted, and it may even affect your daily life. At this point, it is recommended that you take immediate action to seek professional psychological counseling or treatment to cope with and reduce stress. At the same time, keep in touch with friends and family to share your feelings and confusion, their understanding and support will be a great help to you.
You are in excellent condition and full of energy. Continue to maintain this good pace of life and rest habits, so that the body and mind to maintain the best condition, enjoy every moment of life.

You may feel slightly tired, which is your body\'s way of reminding you that you need to rest. Mild fatigue is the body\'s natural response to daily activities. Proper rest, proper diet and regular rest can help the body recover quickly.

You may be experiencing moderate levels of fatigue at the moment, so it is recommended to temporarily reduce the burden of work or study and engage in more relaxing activities, such as deep breathing, yoga or walking. You can increase the length of sleep or nap appropriately to ensure the quality of sleep and help restore energy.

Excessive fatigue can seriously affect your physical and mental health, and it is recommended that you immediately stop your current activities, get plenty of rest, and seek help from a doctor or professional. Don\'t ignore your body\'s warnings and take timely steps to recover.

You may be experiencing negative emotions, feeling a bit stressed and insecure. Please pay attention to adjust your mentality, try to find the root cause of the problem, and find the appropriate solution. Keep a positive attitude, give yourself time and space to adjust, and remember to keep your body and mind in balance, and don\'t overdo it.

Your overall emotional performance is relatively stable, which is an important mentality in the face of various challenges. Continue to maintain this balance and don\'t let external changes and distractions disturb your inner self. At the same time, we should dare to accept the small challenges in life, exercise our ability to regulate our emotions, and make ourselves more resilient and confident.

Your mood is positive, always full of motivation and energy. Continuing to maintain this positive attitude and meet every challenge in life helps to constantly train yourself and make it easier to overcome difficulties when faced with challenges.
